GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.129
GSD.description:
RDMA/cm: Fix memory leak in ib_cm_insert_listen

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit b0cab8b517aeaf2592c3479294f934209c41a26f, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 98f67156a80f37db70ec64787020b1f9bc8aea8c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: RDMA/cm: Fix memory leak in ib_cm_insert_listen
